name: Lost (itch) (YelowLegs)
description:
THE COVER PICTURE IS TEMPORY IT WILL NOT BE A TREE FOREVER!!

Lost is a survival game where you are teleported onto an island where you need to survive, the island is watched by a mysterious group of people watching your every move.... at random times they will try and stop you from surviving....

This game will be updated over time hopefully the first full version out by February 28th 2022

Join my discord server to keep up to date on updates and discuss ideas that you would like to be added.

Join at https://discord.gg/bwaEYvVEYH

(THIS GAME IS IN AN EARLY VERSION LOTS OF STUFF WILL NOT WORK)

Gamemodes-

Basic survival

(In development)sandbox(make your own islands)

(In development)island manager(Watch from above as you try to keep the island alive)

What can you do right now?

You can run around? Try find bugs, etc.

Updates-

February  10th 2022- Survival Update(Gathering wood, Gathering stone, Inventory, crafting(hopefully), command menu)

Please report any bugs in the comments
